subject: Read Receipts Task Restarted
content: Found stalled read receipts task (melo-v2-read-receipts-p1-2-h) with 6+ hours no progress. Spawned fresh worker (f803ca3b) to complete implementation. Cleaned up stalled heartbeat. Task h is critical to complete p1-2 phase. Remaining: connection status (i) and socket removal (j).
